column1: In the swamplands of [[Middle-earth]] lurked the evil phantoms called [[The Mewlips|Mewlips]]
column3: a race of birds. In these swamps also grew the '''Gallows-Weed'''. In [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] Lore
column4: this tree-hanging weed is only known by name
column5: but its physical description is never talked about or described. Few people who ever entered these marshes
column6: and thus even saw these Gallows-Weeds
column8: thus there was no description of them.<ref>{{AB|Mewlips}}</ref>
